title: [Medicine] Treatment with puberty blockers followed by long-term gender-affirming hormones does not reduce bone density in transgender persons receiving testosterone. Those receiving estrogen should receive counseling to play sports, avoid smoking, and ensure adequate calcium and vitamin D.

[Health] High insulin levels directly linked to pancreatic cancer. A new study from researchers at the University of British Columbia's Faculty of Medicine reveals a direct link between high insulin levels, common among patients with obesity and Type 2 diabetes, and pancreatic cancer
